name: Monsieur Fourier est furieux (test)
description:
Highly interactive art piece which generates shapes of any complexity. The user can take control of the drawing by modifying the algorithm through its graphical representation and by setting color and pen size.

Based on the mathematical theory on Fourier series.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourier_series


Note: The work reacts to keyboard input only after you have clicked into the canvas at least once.

Note: Sound on! Click once into the canvas to start sound.


+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Take control                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------+

  Toggle between DRAW and EDIT mode             [return key]

  Toggle PAUSE                                   [space bar]

  Toggle RAINBOWS                                        [c]

  Change PEN COLOR                             [mouse wheel]

  Change PEN SIZE                                    [+] [-]

  DELETE drawing                               [right-click]


------------------------------------------------------------
The following things are possible in EDIT mode only:
------------------------------------------------------------

Place mouse cursor somewhere on the canvas, but not on a segment. Then:

  ADD or REMOVE segments                       [mouse wheel]


Place mouse cursor over the center point of a segment, then:

  Change segment RADIUS                        [mouse wheel] 
                                 or [hold left mouse button]

  Change segment SPEED                         [mouse wheel]


Place mouse cursor over the pen, then:

  Change COLOR                                 [mouse wheel]

  MOVE somewhere else (constrained)         [click and drag]

  MOVE somewhere else (free)  [shift key] + [click and drag]
